main event: On 9 April 1948, Lt. Colonel sighted a silver disc while flying a P-51 over Montgomery, Alabama.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately eight feet in diameter and had the appearance of a parachute., The object was attached to a dark cable approximately five feet long holding a large box-like structure., The object was sighted at an altitude of about 10,000 feet while making a left turn., The sighting lasted approximately forty-five seconds before the object was lost from sight., Colonel [Redacted] noted that the object made no sound and left no exhaust trail.
sighted object: silver disc with a parachute-like appearance
witness description: Lt. Colonel, pilot in the Air Tactical School
